metadata.dc:author: Quintanar Rioja, A
García Pérez, A
Alavés Buforn, M
Bonet Serra, B
López Lafuente, J
Echávarri Olavarría, F
metadata.dc:description: The case of an 9-year-old girl with precocious puberty and a non-functioning pituitary adenoma is described. A review of the literature on the incidence, evolution and therapeutic options of pituitary incidentalomas in children and adults is performed.
metadata.dc:title: Pubertad precoz e incidentaloma hipofisario.
[Precocious puberty and pituitary incidentaloma].
